GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article based on article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Gets all comments associated with a given article_id, sorted by most recent first.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to a specific article.

requestBody.username: string (required) - The username of the user posting the comment.
requestBody.body: string (required) - The content of the comment.

400.description: Bad request (missing required fields, invalid article_id format)

404.description: Not found (article or username does not exist)

body.msg: Article not found or  User not found

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes of an article by the given article_id

requestBody.inc_votes: A number representing the change in votes (positive or negative)

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

400.description: Bad request (e.g., invalid inc_votes or article_id)
